# GeneApp: Interactively Explore Genetic Data <img src = "img/logo1.jpg" align = "right" style = "width: 115px; height: 110px;"/>
**Version 0.9**

The ultimate goal of the project is to provide an intuitive interface, with a comprehensive set of tools, 
that will help researchers to import, explore and visualize large cancer genomics studies. \

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Run once to start the app
geneApp::run_geneApp()
```
